meanings.definition: Glutaminase: an enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of glutamine to glutamic acid.
meanings.sent1: The glutaminase in our bodies helps break down glutamine into glutamic acid.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the role of glutaminase in the digestion process.
meanings.sent3: The glutaminase enzyme decided to throw a party for breaking down glutamine so efficiently.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of a glutaminase, breaking down obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The glutaminase enzyme works tirelessly, like a little worker bee, converting glutamine into glutamic acid.
